snippet.title: Hyper DBZ - 4 / 5.0 - Krillin Trailer!
snippet.description:
Go grab that turtle wax, because we've got one big bald head to shine up! Hyper DBZ welcomes yet another very powerful bald human to the roster, this is ya boi Krillin coming at you!
And hey, it's Hyper DBZ's MVP VA ShockDingo delivering yet another classic voice for on of our characters! This guy is amazing!
Just like this other guy, oh you might have heard of him; DaMarcus008! He once again pops out an awesome, fun and catchy CPS3 theme!  Link to Krillin's theme here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1HqZ_diijos

Hey fans, even though we're not showing a ton, we're still hard at work to deliver the absolute best build we can for you. I hope you'll be able to continue to be patient with us. I'm telling you; behind the scenes it's fire! 

For now, please have a sneak peek of what we have in store for you with Krillin! Oh yeah!
